resources.string: Your device doesn\'t contain a SIM card.

Welcome to \"Remote control via SMS\". This app allows you to enable data and wifi settings remotly, to produce a loud beep, or to receive the current GPS location of your phone. That can be done on receiving specific SMS that you\'ll determine. All the settings are accessible via the menu on the left.
Your version of Google Play services isn\'t recent enough to use that feature. Please upgrade it.
Press 3 times \'Power button\' in less than 4 seconds to send this message.
